metadata.title: CVE-2019-7697 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 v1.5.1-627. There is an assertion failurein AP4_AtomListWriter::Action in Core/Ap4Atom.cpp, leading to a denial ofservice (program crash), as demonstrated by mp42hls.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
